childMarkdownRemark.html: In this Digital Dialogue Silvia Mejía Estévez will show clips from her dissertation project, a documetary video analyzing how new technologies such as Internet, satellite communications, email, video-conferences, and cell phones have changed the experience of being away from home, transforming nostalgia and encouraging the appearance of transnational phenomena.

pageContext.talk_title: Ecuadorian Migration, Nostalgia, and Technology in Transnational Times

childMarkdownRemark.html: Silvia Mejía Estévez is a doctoral candidate in Comparative Literature and a MITH fellow.
